hero.title: ELITE RESIDENCE
hero.paragraph: See how a 5-stories tower's being built, in a short time!

about.title: OUR HISTORY
about.header: OUR CONSTRUCTION COMPANY HAS BEEN FOUNDED 10 YEARS AGO, AT THE VERY PEAK OF THE BUILDING FRENZY IN THE GEORGIA...
about.paragraph: Since then we've built hundreds of commercial, government and private buildings and facilities. It may not sound like a lot, but if you estimate the manpower, working hours, materials, planning and correlating that were all involved in completing each separate project, then our productivity is immense!

residence.title: Choose Your House
residence.paragraph: Rivertown A new premium class complex is an exquisitely designed 5-storey residential building. The complex is located in the prestigious area and is distinguished by its multi-functionality. Everything here is tailored to the comfort of residents: an outdoor pool and spa for relaxation, a fitness center and sports court for healthy living, lounge and relaxation spaces for relaxation, 5,000 sq.m. Green yard. For even more convenience, the Rivertown area housed cafes, supermarkets and a pharmacy. In the construction of a residential house, the highest quality, environmentally friendly, energy-efficient building block of the German brand YTONG is used. Itong block maintains temperature, saves 40% energy and reduces utility bills.

material.header: High-quality energy-efficient building materials are used in the construction of Elite Residence projects.
